data.comment: The match is underway in Porto Alegre.
Throw-in Gremio.
In the minute 1, Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a throw-in for Gremio, close to Fluminense's area.
Throw-in for Fluminense at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Fluminense in their own half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Gremio.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 4, Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gremio's half?
Free kick in a good position for Fluminense!
Fluminense's Dodi misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 6, Goal kick for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Fluminense throw-in in Gremio's half.
In the minute 7, Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Fluminense.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 9, Gremio's Diego Souza goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 11, Fluminense to take a throw-in in Gremio territory.
Throw-in Gremio.
Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Gremio.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Gremio.
Gremio needs to be cautious. Fluminense have an attacking throw-in.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 16, Fluminense drives forward and Nene gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 20, Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 22, Fluminense have a dangerous throw-in.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Fluminense throw-in in Gremio's half.
Fluminense's Evanilson gets in a shot on goal at Arena do Gremio. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 23, Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Throw-in high up the field for Gremio in Porto Alegre.
Fluminense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 28, Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fluminense to take a throw-in in Gremio territory.
Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 30, Lucas Silva of Gremio gets in a strike, but is off target.
Fluminense have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Gremio close to the penalty box.
In the minute 31, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Gremio just outside Fluminense's area.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 34, Free kick Fluminense.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto Alegre.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 35, Yuri Lima (Fluminense) has received a first yellow card.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Gremio.
In the minute 36, Gremio have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
In Porto Alegre, Pedro Geromel (Gremio) misses the target with a header.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Fluminense a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Can Gremio capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fluminense's half?
Alisson gets his shot on target but fails to score for Gremio.
Gremio's Alisson is whistled for offside at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 40, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 41, Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 43, Igor Juliao (Fluminense) gets a yellow card.
Gremio needs to be cautious. Fluminense have an attacking throw-in.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a throw-in for Gremio, close to Fluminense's area.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Fluminense.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 45, Diego Souza scores to make it 1-0 at Arena do Gremio.
Isaque with an assist there.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Arena do Gremio.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 46, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Fluminense make their first substitution with Michel Araujo replacing Yuri Lima.
In Porto Alegre Fluminense drive forward through Nene. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In Porto Alegre Fluminense attack through Yago Felipe. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 48, It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto Alegre.
Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Gremio.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 50, Throw-in Fluminense.
Gremio's Pepe gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Fluminense defender.
Can Gremio capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to Gremio.
Gremio's Isaque breaks free at Arena do Gremio. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Fluminense a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 57, The away team replace Marcos Paulo with Fred.
In the minute 58, Wilton Pereira Sampaio waits before resuming play because Lucas Silva for Gremio is still down.
Gremio's Lucas Silva looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Gremio.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Wilton Pereira Sampaio.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Gremio.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gremio's Alisson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 66, Fluminense have a goal kick.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Fluminense are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 68, Gremio's Luis Orejuela has been booked in Porto Alegre.
Nene (Fluminense) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
In the minute 70, Gremio are pushing forward but Pepe's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
The away team have replaced Nene with Wellington Silva. This is the third substitution made today by Odair Hellmann.
In the minute 71, Darlan Mendes is replacing Isaque for the home team.
Renato Gaucho (Gremio) is making a first change, with Thaciano replacing the possibly injured Lucas Silva.
Free kick Fluminense.
In the minute 73, Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Gremio.
Michel Araujo is booked for the away team.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 74, At Arena do Gremio, Bruno Cortez has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Free kick Fluminense.
Gremio's Pepe is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Odair Hellmann is making the team's fourth substitution at Arena do Gremio with Miguel replacing Evanilson.
Fernando Pacheco is replacing Yago Felipe for Fluminense at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 80, Throw-in Gremio.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Fernando Pacheco (Fluminense) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 83, Igor Juliao for Fluminense gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto Alegre.
Renato Gaucho (Gremio) is making a third substitution, with Thiago Neves replacing Maicon.
In the minute 83, The home team have replaced Diego Souza with Luciano. This is the fourth substitution made today by Renato Gaucho.
Fluminense drive upfield and Igor Juliao gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Gremio defender.
In Porto Alegre Fluminense's Fred is caught offside.
In the minute 85, Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alisson for the home team is judged to be offside.
Free kick for Gremio in the half of Fluminense.
In the minute 87, Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Fluminense to take a throw-in in Gremio territory.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio signals a Gremio throw-in in Fluminense's half.
Can Gremio capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fluminense's half?
In Porto Alegre, Thaciano of Gremio is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Fluminense.
Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wilton Pereira Sampaio awards Fluminense a goal kick.
Fluminense pushes forward through Michel Araujo, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Fluminense close to the penalty box.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-0.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Luis Orejuela for Gremio who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Luis Orejuela (Gremio) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by David Braz.
